India: A Dangerous Place to Be a Woman tag:www.kcet.org,2010-01-19:/shows/india_a_dangerous_place_to_be_a_woman//2785 2015-03-19T23:42:24Z In December 2012 a young medical student was brutally gang-raped on board a bus in Delhi. Horrified by the attack, 28-year-old British Asian Radha Bedi travels to India to uncover the reality of life for young women there. Movable Type Pro 4.38 Watch Documentary 'India: A Dangerous Place to Be a Woman' tag:www.kcet.org,2014:/shows/india_a_dangerous_place_to_be_a_woman//2785.77167 2015-03-18T20:00:00Z 2015-03-19T23:42:24Z A medical student was brutally gang-raped on board a bus in Delhi in late 2012. Horrified by the attack, a 28-year-old journalist traveled to India to uncover the reality of life for young women there.
